faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Durrah

q1.question: Is Durrah really safe for kids?
q1.answer: Yes! We prioritize safety with filtered content, nickname-only login options, and we never sell student data.

q2.question: How does the anti-cheating system work?
q2.answer: Our system detects tab switching, fullscreen exits, and suspicious behavior patterns using AI without requiring complex software.

q3.question: Can I use Durrah for large school groups?
q3.answer: Absolutely. Our 'Pro' and 'Annual' plans are designed for high-capacity exams with detailed analytics.

q4.question: Do students need an account?
q4.answer: Students can join with just a code and nickname, or use the Student Portal to track their long-term progress.
